title: What technological invention would have the best impact on the world and would ultimately make society better? - Quora

CLEAN way of making lab-grown meat! In my opinion, any technological invention that makes us not to worry about our necessities like food, health, and shelter. The current way of getting the meat from the animals is highly inefficient and cannot scale to feed to billions of people. "We shall escape the absurdity of growing a whole chicken in order to eat the breast or wing, by growing these parts separately under a suitable medium." Ref: Cultured meat - Wikipedia 8% of the world''s water supply and one third of the world's non-ice landmass is used for raising livestock for meat and leather. At least 18% of the greenhouse gases entering the atmosphere are from the livestock industry. Firstly, we can make our planet happy. Check these numbers to see the benefit that lab-grown meat can have.  it takes 6.7 pounds of grain, 52.8 gallons of water, 74.5 square feet of land, and 1,036 Btus of fossil fuel energy for feed production, according to a recent NPR study. Take those numbers and multiply them by the 26.4 billion pounds of beef that was consumed in the US in 2010 and the environmental burden becomes catastrophic.  Lab-grown meat can redefine of the entire agriculture and livestock industries.
